Class Miner

java.lang.Object
application.Miner
public class Miner extends Object
Represents the player character with position, inventory, and status attributes. Manages mining tools, oxygen levels, gold collection, and movement.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Miner(int row, int col, String characterImage)
    Constructs a new Miner at the specified position.

      public Miner(int row, int col, String characterImage)
      Constructs a new Miner at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      row - the starting row position
      col - the starting column position
      characterImage - the image file for the character

      Gets the mining damage of current tools.
      Returns:
      the tools damage value

    • depleteOxygen

      public void depleteOxygen()
      Depletes oxygen based on depth and triggers game over if oxygen is too low. Oxygen refills when at ground level.

    • hurt

      public void hurt(int damage)
      Applies damage to the miner by reducing oxygen.
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to take

    • subtractGold

      public boolean subtractGold(int amount)
      Subtracts gold from the miner's inventory if sufficient funds available.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of gold to subtract
      Returns:
      true if subtraction was successful, false if insufficient funds

    • setLoseCallback

      public void setLoseCallback(Runnable loseCallback)
      Sets the callback to execute when the miner loses (oxygen ends).
      Parameters:
      loseCallback - the runnable to execute on game over
